document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2010-09
document.heading: AN URGENCY ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, AMENDING TITLE 19, DIVISION 3, CHAPTER 19.42.030, TITLE 19, DIVISION 3, CHAPTER 19.43.040, and TITLE 19, DIVISION 3, CHAPTER 19.44.040 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE, TO EXTEND THE EXPIRATION PERIOD OF CONDITIONAL USE PERMIT, VARIANCE, AND MINOR VARIANCES IF THE UNDERLYING USE OR PROJECT IS NOT INAUGURATED TO THREE YEARS FROM THE PERMIT APPROVAL DATE WHEN THE STATE OF CALIFORNIA UNEMPLOYEMENT RATE REMAINS OVER NINE PERCENT
